intro: Cephalomanes insigne var. makinoi, commonly known as the Makino's starwort, is a flowering plant native to Japan. It belongs to the family Polygonaceae, which includes plants commonly known as buckwheats. The plant is characterized by its star-shaped flowers and lanceolate leaves. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest floors. Its botanical features make it a notable species in the study of temperate flora.
